column1: review
Value for money . Reduces pain , makes walking comfortable.Read more
Product is good and comfortable and also pain relief but made of rubber i think it's not for longest but it's very good product.Read more

The product is really good I have been using this product for last more than 6 to 8 months now and happy with the. The product is really nice and I been using it for long morning walks the feet feel comfortable even with long walks and I would like to recommended to all those people who have some kind a problem with their feet while walking this can be used for morning walk or even within the house also. The slippers are lightweight and hence issues.Read more
Very good product worth the priceRead more
